reviews.review: Бля,я из игры в кс об английском узнаю больше чем из уроков английского...
игра для лохов как и я

The game is really fun especially when you play with a group of friends! Is what I would have said if its true, the way this game is functioning now is absolutely ridiculous, you cannot do good in a game without getting called a cheater and reported, God FORBID you have a group of friends you play with that tell you where the enemies are or you have a really good headset and shoot them from a corner because you are apparently hacking. I spent a very large amount of money on this game just to get a VAC Ban for being moderately good at the game while there are actual cheaters in game. Also once you get reported you get sent to these "Low Trust Factor" lobbies where you play against nothing but hackers and there's no way out of the lobbies. Do yourself a favor, don't do good in this game, don't have good teammates, don't have good headsets, and you are set to succeed in this game.
This is a good game to play, really interesting
